item.title: JavaScript Classes
item.description: JavaScript Classes JavaScript classes are a fundamental part of modern web development, offering a more structured approach to object-oriented programming (OOP) in JavaScript. Introduced in ECMAScript 2015 (ES6), classes provide a syntactical sugar over JavaScript’s existing prototype-based inheritance, making it easier to create objects, manage inheritance, and write cleaner, more readable code. Introduction The concept of classes in JavaScript may seem daunting at first, especially if you come from a non-OOP background.
